game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a valuable artifact is buried within an abandoned temple deep in the jungle. Your mission is to locate it and bring it back.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Zelvin has marked a map with an approximate location. Find the hidden entrance in the dense foliage.
task.location: Jungle Clearing, southwest of the village

task.description: The ruins are guarded by ancient traps and riddles. Solve them to reach the heart of the temple.
The artifact is said to be in the inner sanctum of the temple. Retrieve it and bring it back to Zelvin.
